name: Canvas 3: Tanshoku no Pastel
synopsis: Yamabuki Manabu made a promise to his father - if he managed to get first prize in the Sakurabana art competition, he can continue studying art. If not, he must forget his dream of becoming an artist and continue his studies as a normal person. Accompanied by his friends in the art club and the addition of a new club member, can Manabu find inspiration to draw an art piece capable of winning the competition?
